abstract_ssm: One deed and supporting documentation regarding burial plots in Cypress Hills Cemetery purchased by William Randell (or Randall) of Newtown, Queens in 1864. William Randell, of the family after which Randall's Island in Manhattan is named, married into the prosperous Vanderveer family.
corpname_ssm: Cypress Hills Cemetery (Brooklyn, New York, N.Y.)

name_sim: Cypress Hills Cemetery (Brooklyn, New York, N.Y.)
